Tests that requesting database works for IndexedDB with storage bucket

Open database, some object stores and add a value for default bucket
database, object stores created and value added

Request database for storage key
database object store names[
    [0] : test-store
    [1] : another-test-store
]
Open database, some object stores and add a value for test-bucket bucket
database, object stores created and value added

Request database for storage key
database object store names[
    [0] : test-store
    [1] : another-test-store
]
